settings.heading: VIP Business Immersion for Latina Women Entrepreneurs in the USA
Transform Your Business Vision into Reality

settings.text: As a Latina woman entrepreneur in the USA, your business aspirations are unique. You bring a rich blend of cultural understanding and ambition, yearning to bridge the gap between Latina and American clientele. If you're ready to take your small business to the next level, our VIP Business Immersion is designed precisely for you.

This isn't just another coaching program. It's an exclusive, one-on-one, day-long intensive tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're an established businesswoman or just starting, you'll receive a comprehensive business strategy that is as vibrant and dynamic as you are.

Our VIP Business Immersion service is meticulously designed for women entrepreneurs who crave accountability and guidance in launching new products, redesigning their business models, or fine-tuning their business in a more authentic style. You'll get a full day of intensive, one-on-one strategy sessions with me, Cintia, where we will:

  • Deep-dive into Business Strategy: Craft a personalized marketing plan, optimize your Shopify or other online store, and explore ways to expand beyond Latina-only customers to a more diverse client base, including American clients.
  • Create a Compelling Online Presence: Revamp your website development, improve your online store interface, and enhance the visuals of your business journey.
  • Align Your Business with Your Vision: Utilize my 30 years of experience as an immigrant entrepreneur to shape a purpose-driven, profitable business that's in harmony with your lifestyle and goals.

• Comprehensive Strategy: You'll develop a robust business strategy and marketing plan, focusing on social media, website, and visual content tailored to your target market.
  • Cultural Bridging: Learn how to effectively engage Latina and American clients, enhancing your business's reach and impact.
  • Dedicated Support: Enjoy 30 days of email support after your session, ensuring continuous growth and accountability.

settings.heading: What to Expect from Your VIP Experience
Experience Immediate and Lasting Impact in your business.¬†

settings.heading: When does the email support begin?
settings.row_content: Email support starts 72 hours after your VIP day.

settings.heading: What if I need more time to utilize the support?
settings.row_content: We want to ensure you maintain momentum while the insights are fresh; therefore, extensions are unavailable.¬†

settings.heading: ¬†What are the payment terms?
settings.row_content: ¬†A 50% deposit secures your calendar spot, with the balance due 48 hours before your session.

settings.heading: What is your cancellation policy?
settings.row_content: We understand plans change. If you need to reschedule, provide a 72-hour notice. Cancellations before the initial kick-off session will receive a 50% refund. Unfortunately, cancellations after this point are non-refundable.
